name: markopolis
description: Markopolis is a self-hosted platform for highlighting and annotating text on any web page. It stores highlights, tags quotes, and allows access later through a searchable UI ideal for research or note-taking.
features: Web highlighting: Select and highlight text on any webpage for later reference and review.
Annotation system: Add notes and comments to highlighted passages for context and analysis.
Tag organization: Categorize highlights with custom tags for research topics or projects.
Search interface: Find specific highlights across all saved pages using full-text search.
Browser extension: Capture highlights directly from your browser without switching apps.
Quote extraction: Automatically extract and format highlighted text as quotations.
Source tracking: Maintain links to original pages and capture metadata like author and date.
Collection management: Group related highlights into collections for different research projects.
Export functionality: Download highlights in Markdown, CSV, or JSON formats for external use.
Privacy focused: All highlights stored on your server with no third-party tracking.
Bulk operations: Tag, delete, or move multiple highlights simultaneously for efficient management.
Reading list: Save pages for later reading and highlighting without immediate processing.
